content: here is a great reversible scarf design with an added twist or three firstly it s knitted sideways so although you have a lot of sts on the needle you don t have to knit so many row secondly the fringe is knitted in so once you cast off and sew in the ends it s ready to wear and thirdly the fringe is made up of litle twisty tassels that are so easy to work i loved making it and it was completed in a weekend the yarn is rowan tapestry dk which is a soft wool/soybean mix in random shades the stripes in the scarf are just the natural colour changes in the yarn you could also try different dks or try thicker or thinner yarns changing needle size as appropriate to make a smaller or bigger scarf
